item.title: Blazor Authentication and Authorization
item.description: Blazor Authentication and Authorization This example represents a Blazor application that allows users to view a list of blog posts. The application uses ASP.NET Core and Blazor authentication and authorization to control access to the blog posts. Before diving into the code, let’s understand some key concepts related to Blazor: Blazor: Blazor is a web framework that allows developers to build interactive web UIs using C# instead of JavaScript. It enables developers to write code that runs on the client-side in the browser using WebAssembly or on the server-side using SignalR.
